properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NM , DECODE(MEMBER_GENDER, 'M', '남', '여') MEMBER_GENDER, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') ENROLL_DATE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NM , DECODE(MEMBER_GENDER, 'M', '남', '여') MEMBER_GENDER FROM "MEMBER"
